roleset.name: to give an old object a new purpose/role
roleset.note: REPURPOSE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire (from repurpose.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: Reading the comments to the WSJ article , I was interested to see two of the first six or seven mention PRO repurposing part of the building to be a library .
